# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(words, text_width::Int=10)
    lines = []
    current_line = ""
    
    for word in words
        if length(current_line) + length(word) > text_width
            push!(lines, current_line)
            current_line = word
        else
            current_line *= " $word"
        end
    end
    
    push!(lines, current_line)
    return join(lines, "\n")
end

words = ["Lorem", "ipsum", "dolor", "sit", "amet"]
wrapped_text = wrap_string(words)
println(wrapped_text)
```

Example output:
```text
Lorem ipsum dolor
sit amet
```
